issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description:
Ambari -> Tez view has 
"Hive Queries" and "All DAGs" view pages.
The queue names from a query id and from its DAG id does not match for Tez engine context.
The one from a query is not correct.
fields.summary: HiveServer2 incorrect queue name when using Tez instead of MR

comments.body:
Hi [~prasanth_j] I have a patch for the Ambari views
Do you think you can look at this?
Thanks, 
Steve.

If queueName is null I think you should just pick "default" (refer TezSessionState.setupTezParamsBasedOnMR() which uses default if not set) instead of randomly picking up from the list of default queues. Also retTezSessionState.setQueueName(queueName) has to be before doOpen condition. Queue name has to be set before session open.
